articles.title: Stirling available for Ireland's second Test in Sri Lanka - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Two of the ODIs Ireland were supposed to play in Sri Lanka were replaced by a Test, allowing them to make the switch
articles.content: Paul Stirling was in the XI for Ireland's first three Test matches, between 2018 and 2019  •  Sportsfile via Getty Images

articles.title: Hamilton dismisses Verstappen claim after Australian GP - Racingnews365.com
articles.description: A slow start from Verstappen allowed Hamilton to attack into Turn 3 on the opening lap in Melbourne.
articles.content:
Lewis Hamilton has dismissed Max Verstappen's claim that he pushed the Formula 1 World Champion off at Turn 3 in the Australian Grand Prix.

articles.title: South Africa impress to close in on automatic World Cup berth - ICC Cricket
articles.description: South Africa have given themselves every chance of qualifying automatically for this year's ICC Men's Cricket World Cup with a commanding 146-run victory over the Netherlands in Johannesburg on Sunday.
